ngiemboon: Mentoŋ mendá Ngwàna gʉa tÿǒ ńcʉa még.
en: The roofs of Ngwana houses are higher than ours.

ngiemboon: Náa megaʼá ntse né mèŋ n nú.
en: Give me some water, I'll drink.

ngiemboon: À sɔ̌g mekwɔ̀ʼɔ, à tè mégè sɔg.
en: He washed the chairs,  he didn’t wash ours.
The patient ate a little couscous.
